message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $20,000. I believe it will be incredibly valuable for you, and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have.
I'm very interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can we meet in the middle?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but the value of this product is truly significant. How about we meet at $17,000? I'm confident you'll see a return on your investment.
I'm still interested in the product, but $17,000 is a bit too rich for my blood. I'd be willing to meet you at $14,000. Can we shake on it?
